channel.title: Rentals – Image Property
channel.description: Brisbane's premier property management and sales team - specialising in all property services and focus on our relationships and internal processes to ensure a valuable customer experience, whether you're an investor, vendor or tenant.

item.title: 60 East Beaumont Rd, Park Ridge QLD 4125
item.dc:creator: Image Property Management
item.description: TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER...
item.content:encoded:
TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER INFORMATION VISIT THE IMAGE PROPERTY WEBSITE OR SMS “APPLY” TO THE NUMBER BELOW.

Find yourself in a great location with only a short drive to Park Ridge Town Centre, Marsden Park Shopping Centre, Waterford Park Shopping Centre, Grand Plaza Shopping Centre, Logan Hyperdome Shopping Centre, IKEA and Logan homemaker centre. Transport is readily available with bus stations and train stations surrounding your new home.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL CATCHMENTS Logan Reserve State School and Marsden State High School.

Property Features:
# Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances inclusive of DISHWASHER, oven, GAS cooking & rangehood. HUGE sized fridge cavity with plumbing and AMPLE storage to cupboards with LARGE PANTRY. Kitchen bench DOUBLES AS BREAKFAST BAR.
# Open plan living and dining with tiled flooring with CEILING FAN and AIR CONDITIONING. Sliding door access to covered patio.
# Master bedroom with ceiling fan, Ensuite, walk in wardrobe and AIR CONDITIONING
# Ensuite with large shower cavity and storage to vanity. # 2nd Bedroom well sized with ceiling fans and built in wardrobes.
# 3rd Bedroom well sized with ceiling fans and built in wardrobes.
# 4th Bedroom well sized with ceiling fans and built in wardrobes.
# Main bathroom with shower cavity and SEPARATE BATHTUB. Storage to vanity.
# Separate toilet
# Large GRASSED Yard fully fenced – Perfect for pets or children to roam and play.
# LARGE COVERED PATIO ideal for entertainers or alfresco dining in the cool autumn breezes with connection for BBQ Hob through the Natural Gas Line
# Internal Laundry with built-in cupboard.
# Ample Storage with additional Linen Closet
# Blinds throughout
# DOUBLE CAR GARAGE – SECURE REMOTE ACCESS with separate side door access!
# PETS CONSIDERED UPON APPLICATION ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS ONLY.

TO REGISTER:
Please register to ensure that you receive notification of any updates or cancellations. Click ‘Book Inspection’ and follow the prompts to register your details for the open home you wish to attend.

All government guidelines regarding Covid-19 must be followed while attending. Numbers have been capped and each attendee is to wear a mask, use the provided sanitiser and QR code and socially distance where possible.

DISCLAIMER:
Whilst every care is taken in the preparation of the information contained in this marketing, Image Property will not be held liable for any errors in typing or information. All interested parties should rely upon their own enquiries in order to determine whether or not this information is in fact accurate.

PLEASE NOTE:
Legislation states that you must read the General Tenancy Agreement inclusive of any special terms prior to proceeding through our approval process. If applicable, you will receive this in due course, however please contact our office if you do need this at any stage.

item.title: 29 Pummelo Cct, Palmwoods QLD 4555
item.dc:creator: Image Property Management
item.description: This brand new 4 bedroom home is situated in a...
item.content:encoded:
This brand new 4 bedroom home is situated in a peaceful and quiet residential area only a 2 minute drive from the local Palmwoods amenities hub and train station. Prestigious restaurants, schools and access to public transport are all just a stones throw away. Coast´s world-class beaches are within a 20-minute drive for weekends out and about and waterfront dining.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL ZONES: Palmwood’s State School & Nambour State College

This property is a must inspect and is sure to impress with features including:

# Sleek and modern kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space featuring stone bench tops, stainless steel appliances including electric cooktop, oven, dishwasher and rangehood.
# Open plan kitchen and living room with ceiling fan and air-conditioning
# Great sized Master bedroom with private ensuite, ceiling fan, air-conditioning and walk in robe.
# Ensuite with large shower, toilet and storage to vanity
# 2nd, 3rd and 4th bedrooms include ceiling fans, built ins and window coverings
# Covered alfresco off main living area with ceiling fan, opening the property to cooling flow through breezes and connecting the outdoor to the indoor, perfect for entertaining
# Main bathroom with separate bathtub, large shower cavity, toilet and storage to vanity
# Internal laundry with storage
# Remote double lock up garage
# Large fully fenced yard – perfect for children to play!
# Lawn maintenance included
# PETS CONSIDERED ON APPLICATION, CASE BY CASE BASIS

TO REGISTER:
Please register to ensure that you receive notification of any updates or cancellations. Click ‘Book Inspection’ and follow the prompts to register your details for the open home you wish to attend.

DISCLAIMER:
Whilst every care is taken in the preparation of the information contained in this marketing, Image Property will not be held liable for any errors in typing or information. All interested parties should rely upon their own enquiries in order to determine whether or not this information is in fact accurate.

item.content:encoded:
TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER INFORMATION VISIT THE IMAGE PROPERTY WEBSITE OR SMS “APPLY” TO THE NUMBER BELOW.

This stunning apartment is situated within the highly sought after Tempo Apartments & offers a contemporary design without compromising on space. Situated within a short distance to the many amenities this location has to offer, such as Brisbane CBD, Southbank, and West End’s cultural precinct. Apartments in this area do not last long and with such fantastic features there will be no time to delay!

Transport is readily available at Montague Road at Donkin Street, Stop 7,Buses 60 & 192

The complex is also located within the Brisbane State High School and West End State School catchment areas.

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

Features Include:
# Modern kitchen with stone bench tops, four piece GAS cook top stove, range hood and DISHWASHER
# AIR-CONDITIONED lounge and dining area
# Main bedroom with AIR CONDITIONING, built in wardrobes, and access to balcony
# Stylishly appointed bathroom has a shower over BATH tub for relaxation
# Separate indoor laundry with DRYER included
# STUDY nook
# Entertainer’s BALCONY with leafy outlook
# Single car space in the secure basement parking
# Tempo apartments boast an in-ground POOL, BBQ area, gymnasium, lift access, secure entrances and parking

TO REGISTER:
Please register to ensure that you receive notification of any updates or cancellations. Click ‘Book Inspection’ and follow the prompts to register your details for the open home you wish to attend.

item.content:encoded:
TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER INFORMATION VISIT THE IMAGE PROPERTY WEBSITE OR SMS “APPLY” TO THE NUMBER BELOW.

Find yourself in an absolute prime location in the heart of Chermside. Westfield Chermside is located a total 4 MINUTE JOURNEY from home providing access to everything you could possibly need from the array of cafe’s and restaurants to the hundreds of retail stores.

Transport is readily available with Bus Stop #39 on Hamilton Rd at Farnell St a total of 300m from your front doorstep – This bus stop allows access to Bus Line #325 to City & Queen St, Bus Line #338 to Brendale, Bus Line #340 to Chermside/Carseldine and Bus Line #353 to Edward St, Brisbane City. Latham Street allows a life of convenience with all you could ever need a total of 650m to Westfield Chermside Shopping Centre.

CONFRIMED SCHOOL ZONES: Craigslea State School & Craigslea State High School.

FEATURES:
# Modern kitchen with AMPLE STORAGE, stainless steel appliances including range hood, oven and DISHWASHER. Ample Bench space and Island Bench doubling as a BREAKFAST BAR.
# Open plan living and dining with tiled flooring and SPLIT SYSTEM AIR CONDITIONING
# LARGE entertainers balcony perfect for alfresco dining and enjoying the cool breezes.
# Main bedroom with ceiling fan, walk-in wardrobe and ENSUITE.
# Ensuite has great sized shower cavity and storage to vanity.
# Well sized second bedroom with ceiling fan and built-in wardrobe.
# Main bathroom with LARGE shower over bathtub and storage to vanity.
# Intercom Access to the building
# 1 secure car-park with remote access.
# Flyscreens and blinds throughout.

This is a beautifully functional four bedroom home, with two bathrooms, a huge fully fenced yard and a double garage. This home features an open plan family and dining area which spills out to an alfresco area – perfect for outdoor entertaining!

The property is conveniently located within close proximity to schools, 8 minutes to the Burpengary Train station, Sports facilities and its just a very short drive to access the Bruce highway for the commute to Brisbane or the Sunshine coast.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL ZONES: Morayfield East State School & Morayfield State High School

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

Features Include:
# Well appointed kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space, modern appliances including dishwasher
# Large open plan lounge and dining with AIR-CONDITIONING and ceiling fans
# Separate living room with ceiling fan
# Huge main bedroom with ceiling fan & walk-in wardrobe
# Generously sized carpeted second, third and fourth bedrooms with ceiling fans
# Main bathroom features separate bath, shower and large vanity
# Cemented patio perfect for alfresco dining and outdoor entertaining
# Large fully fenced backyard perfect for kids and animals to enjoy
# Black out blinds throughout
# Security screens throughout
# Internal laundry
# Double remote lock up garage.
# PETS CONSIDERED UPON APPLICATION ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS ONLY

item.title: 17/87 Victoria St, Windsor QLD 4030
item.dc:creator: Image Property Management
item.description: TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER...
item.content:encoded:
TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER INFORMATION VISIT THE IMAGE PROPERTY WEBSITE OR SMS “APPLY” TO THE NUMBER BELOW.

Be sure not to miss out on your opportunity to call this property home. There are many great parks with playgrounds, sporting facilities, bike paths and walking tracks. The connections are second to none, you can head in any direction from Windsor and find a major arterial that will take you straight there to avoid the traffic. It’s connectivity is second to none of any other Brisbane suburb.

The bus services and train lines are exceptional, there are two stations, Windsor and Albion both within walking distance from almost anywhere in Windsor. Nearby to Wilston and Newmarket shopping / cafe precincts and also the upcoming Albion village for night life / eating out.

Transport is also readily available with Bus Stop 11 (Lutwyche Rd near Taylor St) only a minute walk from your doorstep! The Airport Link Tunnel is also easily accessible. Only minutes away from the CBD the location couldn’t get any better!!

Confirmed School Catchments: Windsor State School & Kelvin Grove State College

Features Include:
# Large master bedroom with AIR CONDITIONING, FAN & ENSUITE bathroom
# Well sized second bedroom,built-ins with AIR CONDITIONING and FAN
# Sleek and modern main bathroom with two way access to second bedroom # Huge open lounge living area with AIR CONDITIONING
# Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and stone bench tops, GAS stove and DISHWASHER
# Internal laundry
# Good sized secluded BALCONY
# Large undercover secure parking
# PETS CONSIDERED UPON APPLICATION ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS ONLY

TO REGISTER:
Please register to ensure that you receive notification of any updates or cancellations. Click ‘Book Inspection’ and follow the prompts to register your details for the open home you wish to attend.

This 2 Bedroom home is ready for inspection following the final stages of construction. Find yourself in the heart of Gaythorne with Brookside Shopping Centre a total 2kn journey from your new home providing access to everything you could possibly need: Cafe & Shop Fronts, Woolworths & Coles, Myer & BIG Q, Banks & Liquor Stores. Transport is readily available with your nearest Bus Station Gaythorne Rd at Chruch, Stop 5 a total of 75m from your door step providing access to Bus Line #361 to City, Ann St. Gaythorne Railway Station also 0.8km from home.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL CATCHMENT ZONES: Mitchelton State School & Mitchelton State High School.

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

# PRIVATE COURTYARD with patio & gardens for a great alfresco dining experience!
# Modern kitchen well stainless steel appliances inclusive of DISHWASHER, LARGE Fridge cavity with AMPLE STORAGE
# AIR CONDITIONED living and dining with stunning TIMBER FLOORING
# Main bedroom with SPLIT SYSTEM AIR CONDITIONING, ceiling fan, WALK IN WARDROBE and ENSUITE
# 2nd Bedroom with BUILT IN WARDROBE and CEILING FAN

Don’t miss the opportunity to inspect this property today. The spacious 3-bedroom family home has been well maintained and a golden opportunity not to be missed.

Located in the popular suburb of Wavell Heights you are just a short commute into the CBD with local schools, cafes and shopping centres a short drive away. Public transport into the CBD is easy with regular bus services right outside your doorstep.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL ZONES: Wavell State High School & Geebung State School

This property oozes character and charm throughout, features include:
# Polished timber flooring throughout
# 3 Large bedrooms with BUILT-IN ROBES, 2 featuring air conditioning
# Air-conditioned living area
# Stylish, large open kitchen with gas cooking, breakfast bar and plenty of storage!
# Large low maintenance backyard
# Renovated bathroom with a bathtub
# Drive through rear access
# Crimsafe Security screens throughout

This large three bedroom gem is hidden away in a quiet and secure complex boasting luxurious features including;

# Huge main bedroom with own private access to balcony, ensuite and walk in robe
# Large and oversized balcony with bi-fold doors and shutters for ultimate privacy that can be utilised into a second living area
# Tiled open plan living area with a breezy and leafy outlook over the balcony
# Large double remote lock up garage in secure location under the units with space for storage
# Special key access to building for extra security
# Second bedroom has own private access to balcony including built in wardrobe
# Third bedroom is a good size with built in wardrobe
# All rooms have ducted air conditioning
# Modern kitchen with stone bench top and stainless steel appliances
# Main bathroom is large with large bath tub
# Internal laundry hidden behind cupboards

Within a close proximity to:
# Milton State School and Kelvin Grove State College
# Rosalie cafe precinct & the Paddington shopping strip
# Train lines including the Ipswich, Rosewood, Ferny Grove & Doomben lines
# Many parks and also the Mount Coot-tha walking tracks
# 10 minute walk to Woolworths on Latrobe Terrace

This build is ready to call home! With AIR CONDITIONING and fans throughout and a large open plan lounge/ living opening onto the patio, you’ll find this build ticks all of the boxes! Located in Brand New ‘Alkina’ Estate in Burpengary with easy highway access and shopping conveniences only minutes away, you are centrally located close to transport and amenities whilst still enjoying your peace and quiet. Transport is readily available with Narangba train station a 4-minute journey.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL CATCHMENTS: 2.9km from Jinibara State School, 4.4km from Narangba Valley State High School and 2.1km from Burpengary State Secondary College.

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

Features include:
# Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances inclusive of DISHWASHER, range hood & Electric stove and oven. Largely sized fridge cavity. Added window to provide a LIGHT-AIRY SPACE with AMPLE bench also DOUBLING AS BREAKFAST BAR.
# HUGE Open plan living and dining with split system AIR CONDITIONING and CEILING FAN, opening to covered entertaining patio
# LARGE Main Bedroom with Split AIR CONDITIONING, walk-in wardrobe, and PRIVATE ENSUITE.
# Ensuite with large shower cavity and ample storage to vanity.
# 2nd Bedroom well sized with built – in robe and ceiling fan.
# Large main bathroom with ample storage to vanity and large shower cavity Family BATHTUB and shower cavity combined.
# 3rd Bedroom well sized with built in robe and ceiling fan.
# 4th Bedroom well sized with built in robe and ceiling fan.
# Media Room with ceiling fan and BLINDS are in place and ready to be used for those movies days/nights in.
# LARGE GRASSED YARD fully fenced – Perfect for pets or children to roam and play.
# LARGE COVERED PATIO ideal for entertaining or alfresco dining.
# Internal Laundry with ample storage and side access to the clothesline with ease!
# DOUBLE CAR GARAGE – SECURE REMOTE ACCESS
# Blinds and flyscreens throughout
# PETS CONSIDERED UPON APPLICATION ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS ONLY.

item.content:encoded:

Located in a PRIME position on Gamelin Crescent off of Stafford Road, this property boasts high end finishes and falls within a quiet street in the heart of Stafford. Take advantage of the absolute convenience of having Stafford City Shopping Centre a total of 1km journey from your front doorstep. This beautiful home is spread over 3 levels and will feel like home from the moment you step in the door.

Transport is also readily available with a Bus-Stop 190m walk from home on Stafford Road at Stafford Central which provides access to Busline #369 to Mitchleton Station and 375 & 376 to Stafford City/Bus interchange.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL CATCHMENT ZONES: Stafford State School & Kedron State High School!

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

Property Features:
# Modern kitchen with stone benchtops and stainless steel appliances inclusive of a dishwasher. Ample storage cupboards.
# Spacious open plan tiled living and dining with access to balcony – perfect for enjoying your home-cooked meal in the fresh air and great for entertaining
# Main bedroom with built in wardrobe and sleek ensuite
# Main bathroom with a bath/shower combination and plenty of room for storage
# 2nd & 3rd bedrooms well sized with built in wardrobes
# Artificial Grassed courtyard with private clothes line
# DUCTED AIR CONDITIONING THROUGHOUT
# BLOCK OUT BLINDS THROUGHOUT
# Single lock up garage with remote access

Situated in a premium position, Gamelin Crescent lies within 150 metres to the Bus to the CBD and easy access to the airport link tunnel. With the Kedron Brook Parkland across your doorstep, a quiet street and the incredible standard of these Gamelin Crescent apartments – you’d be crazy to miss out on such an opportunity. Be sure to register for an inspection and I’ll see you at the property !!

# PETS CONSIDERED UPON APPLICATION ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS ONLY

item.description: TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER...
item.content:encoded:
TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER INFORMATION VISIT THE IMAGE PROPERTY WEBSITE OR SMS “APPLY” TO THE NUMBER BELOW.

Situated in a prime location within a 1km journey from the ever so popular Nundah Village, you will find everything you need at your fingertips in this modern 2 bedroom property. Take advantage of the boutique Nundah lifestyle with an abundance of cafe’s and unique restaurants, gym & fitness communities & your local Coles & Woolworths a small distance away.

Transport is ready available with Bus Stop #2 on Wood Road a total of 35m from your front door step.

CONFRIMED SCHOOL ZONES: Nundah State School & Aviation High School.

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

Property Features:
# Large master bedroom with AIR CONDITIONING, Ceiling Fan, Balcony access & private ensuite
# Generous second bedroom with built-in wardrobe, AIR CONDITIONER and CEILING FAN
# Large open plan tiled living area with AIR CONDITIONING
# Large covered balcony off living and main bedroom area- perfect for entertaining!
# Sleek and modern kitchen with stone bench tops and stainless steel appliances
# Lock up parking space with remote access
# Large main bathroom with BATHTUB
# INTERNAL laundry

### Photos are of a similar unit within the complex

*** PETS CONSIDERED UPON APPLICATION ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS ONLY ***

TO REGISTER:
Please register to ensure that you receive notification of any updates or cancellations. Click ‘Book Inspection’ and follow the prompts to register your details for the open home you wish to attend.

All government guidelines regarding Covid-19 must be followed while attending. Numbers have been capped and each attendee is to wear a mask, use the provided sanitiser and QR code and socially distance where possible.

DISCLAIMER:
Whilst every care is taken in the preparation of the information contained in this marketing, Image Property will not be held liable for any errors in typing or information. All interested parties should rely upon their own enquiries in order to determine whether or not this information is in fact accurate.

PLEASE NOTE:
Legislation states that you must read the General Tenancy Agreement inclusive of any special terms prior to proceeding through our approval process. If applicable, you will receive this in due course, however please contact our office if you do need this at any stage.

item.title: 2/39a Clivia Cres, Daisy Hill QLD 4127
item.dc:creator: Image Property Management
item.description: TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER...
item.content:encoded:
TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER INFORMATION VISIT THE IMAGE PROPERTY WEBSITE OR SMS “APPLY” TO THE NUMBER BELOW.

This lowset, 2 bedroom home is sure to tick all the boxes, featuring a large open plan living area with reverse cycle air conditioning, a spacious backyard and multiple parks within walking distance.

Ideally situated to take advantage of surrounding amenities including a 4 minute drive to the Hyperdome shopping centre with access to shops and cafes/restaurants, multiple sporting fields and great schools, 30 mins to Brisbane and 40 min to Gold Coast and access to the M1 very close by.

Transport is also readily available with the closest bus stop- Clivia Crescent and Lyndale Street a 1 minute walk away.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL ZONES: Daisy Hill State School & Mabel Park State High School

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

This property is a must inspect:
# Master bedroom with built in robe, A/C and ceiling fan
# Second bedroom well sized and with built in wardrobe and ceiling fan
# Large open plan living space featuring A/C
# Sleek and modern kitchen with ample bench and cupboard space featuring stone bench tops and stainless steal appliances including a dishwasher
# Main bathroom with separate bath and shower
# Powder room
# Low maintenance yard
# Internal laundry
# Single car carport with further off-street space available
# Pet friendly upon application

This property is situated perfectly to take complete advantage of the surrounding amenities, including local parks and schools, public transport and cafes. Please make sure to register for an inspection today and I will see you at the property !!

TO REGISTER:
Please register to ensure that you receive notification of any updates or cancellations. Click ‘Book Inspection’ and follow the prompts to register your details for the open home you wish to attend.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL ZONES: Indooroopilly State School and Indooroopilly State High School

This property is sure to impress and is a must inspect, with features including;
# Large open plan living and dining areas
# Quality polished timber floors throughout the kitchen and living spaces
# Generous balcony, open bay pass out window from kitchen to balcony
# Modern kitchen complete with stone bench tops, glass splash backs and
quality stainless ‘ilve’ appliances including a dishwasher
# 2 good sized bedrooms with built in robes, quality carpets
# Master bedroom with private ensuite bathroom and private access to the balcony
# Single car accommodation
# Internal laundry
# Ducted air conditioning

item.content:encoded:
This quality brand new home is located in a new estate in Greenbank. It is located in a great position close to shops and schools.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL ZONES: Everly State School and Park Ridge State High school

Property Features:
# Sleek kitchen with modern appliances including, ELECTRIC COOK TOP, RANGE HOOD AND OVEN.
# Tiled living area with AIR CONDITIONING and CEILING FAN
# Well sized main bedroom with CEILING fan and LARGE WARDROBE.
# 2nd, 3rd and 4th bedroom with CEILING FANS and WARDROBES.
# Outdoor patio for entertaining
# Double lock up garage with Laundry
# Fully fenced yard with low maintenance gardens
# Parklands, swings, area to play footy or cricket

item.title: 9 Alkina Drive, Burpengary QLD 4505
item.dc:creator: Image Property Management
item.description: TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER...
item.content:encoded:
TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER INFORMATION VISIT THE IMAGE PROPERTY WEBSITE OR SMS “APPLY” TO THE NUMBER BELOW.

This near new build has just been completed and ready to call home! With AIR CONDITIONING and fans throughout and a large open plan lounge/ living opening onto the patio, you’ll find this build ticks all of the boxes! Located in Brand New ‘Alkina’ Estate in Burpengary with easy highway access and shopping conveniences only minutes away, you are centrally located close to transport and amenities whilst still enjoying your peace and quiet.

Transport is readily available with Narangba train station a 4-minute journey.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL CATCHMENTS: 2.9km from Jinibara State School, 4.4km from Narangba Valley State High School and 2.1km from Burpengary State Secondary College.

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

Features include:
# Modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances inclusive of DISHWASHER, range hood & Electric stove and oven. Largely sized fridge cavity. Added window to provide a LIGHT-AIRY SPACE with AMPLE bench also DOUBLING AS BREAKFAST BAR.
# HUGE Open plan living and dining with split system AIR CONDITIONING and CEILING FAN, opening to covered entertaining patio
# LARGE Main Bedroom with Split AIR CONDITIONING, walk-in wardrobe, and PRIVATE ENSUITE.
# Ensuite with large shower cavity and ample storage to vanity.
# 2nd Bedroom well sized with built – in robe and ceiling fan.
# Large main bathroom with ample storage to vanity and large shower cavity Family BATHTUB and shower cavity combined.
# 3rd Bedroom well sized with built in robe and ceiling fan.
# 4th Bedroom well sized with built in robe and ceiling fan.
# Media Room with ceiling fan and BLINDS are in place and ready to be used for those movies days/nights in.
# Well sized GRASSED YARD fully fenced – Perfect for pets or children to roam and play.
# LARGE COVERED PATIO ideal for entertaining or alfresco dining.
# Internal Laundry with ample storage and side access to the clothesline with ease!
# DOUBLE CAR GARAGE – SECURE REMOTE ACCESS

EXTRA FEATURES INCLUDE:
# Blinds and flyscreens throughout
# PETS CONSIDERED UPON APPLICATION ON A CASE BY CASE BASIS ONLY.

DIRECTIONS TO PROPERTY- Start at Morgan Road, Burpengary and follow this along until the end of the street, turn into a new estate and property is located on the left.

TO REGISTER:
Please register to ensure that you receive notification of any updates or cancellations. Click ‘Book Inspection’ and follow the prompts to register your details for the open home you wish to attend.

All government guidelines regarding Covid-19 must be followed while attending. Numbers have been capped and each attendee is to wear a mask, use the provided sanitiser and QR code and socially distance where possible.

item.content:encoded:
TO APPLY FOR THIS PROPERTY OR FIND OUT ANY FURTHER INFORMATION VISIT THE IMAGE PROPERTY WEBSITE OR SMS “APPLY” TO THE NUMBER BELOW.

Two bedroom modern apartment and single studio apartment in ideal Herston location! Located across the road from QUT university this unit could not be in a better position! The property is only a 10 min walk to the RBH and a 5 min walk to QUT campus. The location could not get any better with ample public transport within walking distance as well as the CBD within walking distance.

CONFIRMED SCHOOL ZONE: Kelvin Grove State College

Take a Virtual stroll through the property by clicking the 3D Tour button below.

The property has been finished to a high standard and is sure to impress upon inspection with features including –

2 Bedroom Unit

# Great sized bedrooms all with built-in’s
# Separate rooming – one with additional kitchenette
# Ducted A/C throughout
# 2 sleek and stylish bathrooms
# Modern kitchen with Stainless steel appliances
# Large living area, tiled throughout
# Intercom System
# Washing machine and dryer included
# Ideal unit for shared living!

Studio Apartment

# Open Plan Living/Bedroom
# Kitchenette
# Modern Bathroom

**Photos of a similar unit in complex**
